Course.title: Course
Course.description: Represents a course offered by Spruce Life Skills.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Course entity.

description.description: A detailed description of the course.

category.description: The category that the course belongs to (e.g., NEP).

imageUrl.description: URL of the image representing the course.

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile, including their enrolled courses.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

enrolledCourseIds.description: An array of course IDs that the user is enrolled in.

lastEnrolledAt.description: Timestamp of the last enrollment activity.

definition.description: Stores user profile information, including an array of enrolled course IDs.

firestore.reasoning: This Firestore data structure is designed to support the SpruceConnect application with a focus on simplicity and security. It uses a top-level `courses` collection for public course data and a `users` collection to store user-specific information. Enrollments are stored as an array within each user's document, which simplifies security rules and data fetching for the user's dashboard.
